name: HellOnEarth
description:
Hell On Earth is a top down wave survival game created in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 39.

Rate the game here:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/hellonearth-1

Controls:

Shoot - Left Mouse

Shotgun - Right Mouse

Move - W, A, S, D

Purchase Ammo - E

Purchase Health - Q

Suicide/Restart - R

Skip Cutscenes - Space
